self.name: chatBannedRights
self.description: Represents the rights of a normal user in a supergroup/channel/chat. In this case, the flags are inverted: if set, a flag does not allow a user to do X.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Represents the rights of a normal user in a supergroup/channel/chat. In this case, the flags...

arguments.name: viewMessages
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to view messages in a supergroup/channel/chat

arguments.name: sendMessages
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send messages in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendMedia
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send any media in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendStickers
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send stickers in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendGifs
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send gifs in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendGames
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send games in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendInline
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to use inline bots in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: embedLinks
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to embed links in the messages of a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: sendPolls
arguments.description: If set, does not allow a user to send stickers in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: changeInfo
arguments.description: If set, does not allow any user to change the description of a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: inviteUsers
arguments.description: If set, does not allow any user to invite users in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: pinMessages
arguments.description: If set, does not allow any user to pin messages in a supergroup/chat

arguments.name: untilDate
arguments.description: Validity of said permissions (it is considered forever any value less then 30 seconds or more then 366 days).

parent.name: ChatBannedRights
parent.description: Represents the rights of a normal user in a supergroup/channel/chat.
